item.description:
Hello ASL Enthusiasts!

WHAT: ASL Holiday Party
WHEN: Saturday, December 3rd
TIME: 5:00-10:00PM
WHO: ANYONE is welcome to come by and party in ASL
WHY: To socialize, have fun, and enjoy chatting in ASL, while celebrating the holidays!

 

To get to the Meetup, contact me for directions!

THIS IS OUR ANNUAL HOLIDAY PARTY! Only this year, it's at my house! Bring an appetizer to share, unless you are making a holiday drink of some kind. 

If you can, "officially" RSVP, even if the RSVP is "No," so that we know who is definitely going to come.

It will be great to see folks!

Erika

 

PS. I'll be sending out a Facebook invite too!
item.name: ASL Holiday Party!
